content.question: The figure shows the graph of a continuous piecewise-defined function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math>. The graph consists of a line segment and two semicircles. For which of the following values of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> is <math alttext="f prime of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>â€²</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> undefined?

choices.label: <math alttext="r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> and <math alttext="s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>s</mi></math>
<math alttext="r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> and <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> and <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>
